        public int readOption()
        Reads the option of the user to select an option.
        Pre: The user has to enter a number between 1 and 3.
        Post: The option will be saved.

      • executeGameLoop

        public boolean executeGameLoop(Match currentMatch,
                               int turn)
        Allows the players to move on the current board and choose other game modes.
        Pre: The user has to enter all the information needed.
        Post: Returns the score saved.
        Parameters:
        currentMatch - It is the current game.
        turn - It is the turn of each player.

      • simulationLoop

        public void simulationLoop(Match currentMatch,
                           int turn)
        Starts the simulation mode.
        Pre: The user has to enter the word "simul" and it is called in the executeGameLoop method.
        Post: Starts the simulation mode.
        Parameters:
        currentMatch - It is the current game.
        turn - It is the turn of each player.
